title: Malaysia welcomes Madrid Criminal Court's decision on Stampa
summary: Malaysia welcomes the Madrid Criminal Court's decision on rogue arbitrator Dr Gonzalo Stampa who was found guilty contempt of court and was sentenced six months in prison as a significant victory for the rule of law.
content:
